info:
Usage: a!info <character name>
 Returns: Commands, Passives and General information about a character.
abilities:
Usage: a!abilities <character name>
 Returns: All command abilities for a character.
gear:
Usage: a!gear <character name>
 Returns: All gear for a character.
stats:
Usage: a!stats <character name>
 Returns the stats of a character at various levels.
